LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.DecayRate.de: The amount of HP that each building loses per day.
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.DecayStep.de: The amount of HP lost at a time. The damage accrues up to this threshold before being applied to the building.
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.Variance.des: The amount that the decay rate varies between buildings.
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.Structures.d: Only affect buildings from the "Structures" architect tab.
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.Outside.desc: Only affect buildings that are not in an enclosed and roofed room.
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.Owned.title: Only player-owned buildings
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.Owned.desc: Only affect buildings that are owned by the player.
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.Ancient.desc: Also affect parts of ancient dangers. Warning: When active, this will cause ancient dangers to open spontaneously when the walls have decayed.
LanguageData.kathanon.DecayingStructures.HomeArea.des: Only affect buildings that are inside or outside of home area.
